subject: Re: [junit] EJB testing
msgSnippet: this could be easily accomplished if you are using JBuilder, else you will need to use cactus. It is a jakarta project. ... __________________________________
messageBody:
this could be easily accomplished if you are using
JBuilder, else you will need to use cactus. It is a
jakarta project.
